code: export var msToMin=function msToMin(ms){var minutes=Math.floor(ms/60000);var seconds=(ms%60000/1000).toFixed(0);return minutes+':'+(seconds<10?'0':'')+seconds;};export var msToHMS=function msToHMS(duration){var milliseconds=parseInt(duration%1000/100),seconds=parseInt(duration/1000%60),minutes=parseInt(duration/(1000*60)%60),hours=parseInt(duration/(1000*60*60)%24);hours=hours<10?'0'+hours:hours;minutes=minutes<10?'0'+minutes:minutes;seconds=seconds<10?'0'+seconds:seconds;return hours+':'+minutes+':'+seconds;};var cutWord=function cutWord(word,index){return word.slice(0,index)+'...';};export default{msToMin:msToMin,msToHMS:msToHMS,cutWord:cutWord};
